intro: Psychotria polyneura, commonly known as the "soul vine," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, including countries like Brazil and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and small, white or pale green flowers. It is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests and undergrowth. Psychotria polyneura is also known for its psychoactive properties, containing compounds like dimethyltryptamine (DMT) in its leaves.
